arguments.argument:
chatLog = ds_list_create() var i; for (i=0; i<CHATLOG_SIZE; i+=1){ ds_list_add(chatLog, "") }
isTyping=false hidden=true idle=false idleTime=global.chatExpiryTime*30 offset=0 localCommand=""

blinking_underscore=false blink_speed=10
placeholderMsg="Type your chat message..." placeholderMsgGlobal="(global)" placeholderMsgTeam="(team)"
alpha=1
